item.title: Outside 20 and 21 chalcot square, 16th August
item.description:

item.title: Pot hole exposing edge of manhole cover, 16th August
item.description:
Very dangerous, damaged my wheel and tyre as corner of exposed manhole sliced my tyre and wheel. Pot hole is over 6 inches deep
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London

item.title: Unsafe : Overgrown vegetation obscuring driversâ€™ view when turning into Shooters Hill Rd from Donaldson Rd, 16th August
item.description:
The vegetation is so tall that one can not see oncoming traffic when attempting to turn right onto Shooters Hill Td from Donaldson Rd. This is very dangerous and an accident waiting to happen. Please can it be cut right back. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Shooters Hill, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large dip in the baby/toddler area of the play park, 16th August
item.description:
